item.title: Converting Xml To Json in Node
item.description: There are many big data solutions catering to data transformation. A common business problem when migrating data from one cloud host to another is to not only load data from one type to another, but also discover and alter the schema. Json is overtaking Xml as the popular HTTP payload format for REST services. There are big data ETL tools like AWS Glue that can scale XML and JSON transformation to gigabytes of data.
